Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone!

We are pleased to announce that KasperVld is now officially a member of Squad. He's put in a TON of hard work as a moderator, and we're all thrilled to have him aboard as a staff member. He is officially the Lead Moderator and as such, will be in charge of bringing up goodwill and laying down the law throughout the community - especially here on the forum. If you're familiar with the work he's been doing on the forum, rest assured you'll be seeing that and then some as an official member of our team.

Once again, congrats on the upgrade

Thank you so very much for the opportunity. I know I must've said that a dozen times in different places already but it's very exciting to work here professionally. And you can trust that I mean it when I say it wouldn't have happened without such an awesome community that first convinced me to stay here, then to moderate here, and now this. So to everyone who's reading this: thank you!
